page.title: 18Springfield C.of E. Primary
page.content: Our school,built in 1815 is the oldest school building in Essex.It is interesting and has red brick walls,stone floors and a slate roof.There are 3 stone plaques outside with most of the writing worn away.There are 5 teachers,5 classrooms,120 children,an office ad a kitchen with lovely smells.There is no hall and the toilets are outside.Some of our parents,grandparents and great grandparents attended our school.Our school is good because we have clubs,gerbils,a computer,day trips and field courses.Some of our mums come in to help with reading,art and craft.Outside we have a football field,adventure playground and an air raid shelter for sports equipment.We are all looking forward to our new school being built this year.
